subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes. o Fry in hot oil until golden.
subsection_analysis.source_section: o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o Add flour and mix until combined. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.
subsection_analysis.source_section: o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped..

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. o Serve with pita bread. Mutabal • Ingredients: o 2 eggplants o 1/4 cup tahini o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash.
subsection_analysis.source_section: o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive..

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using). o Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in batter. o Cook until golden on both sides.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Mushroom Risotto Ingredients: • 1 cup Arborio rice • 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced • 1/2 cup white wine • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese • 2 tablespoons butter • 2 tablespoons olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste •
subsection_analysis.source_section: Mushroom Risotto Ingredients: • 1 cup Arborio rice..

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Beef Stroganoff Ingredients: • 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced • 1 cup beef broth • 1 cup sour cream • 2 tablespoons flour • 2 tablespoons butter • 1 teaspoon paprika • Salt and pepper to taste • Egg noodles or rice for
subsection_analysis.source_section: Beef Stroganoff Ingredients: • 1 pound beef sirloin,..

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Cook crab cakes until golden and crispy on both sides. • Serve with lemon wedges. Enchiladas Ingredients: • 1 pound ground beef • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 can (14.5 ounces) enchilada sauce • 1 cup shredded cheese • 8 tortillas • 1 teaspoon cumin • 1 teaspoon chili powder • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375F (190C).
subsection_analysis.source_section: • Cook crab cakes until golden and crispy on both sides

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Spread hummus inside each pocket. • Fill with cucumber, bell pepper, carrots, and spinach. Tuna Salad Ingredients: • 1 can tuna, drained • 1/4 cup mayonnaise • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard • 1 celery stalk, diced • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • Salt and pepper to taste • Lettuce leaves or whole grain bread for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion.

• Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. • Let cool before slicing. Breakfast Tacos Ingredients: • 2 large eggs • 1/4 cup shredded cheese • 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • 1/4 cup diced onions • 2 small flour tortillas • Salsa for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat.
subsection_analysis.source_section: • Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.
subsection_analysis.source_section: o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor
